to.sven.androidrccar.client.presentation.view

Class DistanceView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • to.sven.androidrccar.client.presentation.view.DistanceView

  • public class DistanceView
extends View
    Draws a circle with a arrow to bearing of the car and writes the distance under it.
    Author:
    sven

        bearingTo - Bearing in degree from north to east.
